## Source: amazon-inspector (2ffd0991cb1cc7098930838b404210022aa2667d78f2884417f449d85e90fb12)
The package ugc-kit was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (78255cc2dc6c1a0b4d77756828a287e13391c46cfb67f0632a013725de6efeca)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ugc-kit' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
